players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "This is terrible! Poor Bob. We need to figure out who the mafioso is among us three. I'm suspicious of Charlie - he seems too calm about this whole situation. What do you think, Alice?"

Charlie: "Diana, that's rich coming from you! I investigated you last night and discovered you're the mafioso. You killed Bob and now you're trying to frame me. Alice, we need to vote Diana out immediately!"
You: "Wait Charlie, if you're claiming to be the detective who investigated Diana, why didn't you speak up first? Diana spoke before you made your accusation. That timing seems suspicious to me."

Diana: "Alice, you're absolutely right to be suspicious of Charlie's timing! If he really investigated me and found I was the mafioso, why didn't he immediately announce it? Instead, he waited until after I s"

Charlie: "Alice, think about it logically - Diana killed Bob at night, so of course she's prepared with accusations against me! I'm the detective and I KNOW she's the mafioso. If we don't vote her out now, she "

You: "Both of you are making accusations without solid proof. Charlie, your timing is suspicious - why wait to announce such crucial information? Diana, your immediate suspicion of Charlie also seems conven"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
